code:
%%{HealthTech_EMR_Sync}}}%%
stateDiagram-v2
title: SM-03.01 — Proposal Lifecycle (HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine)

[HealthTech_EMR_Sync] --> DRAFT : ProposalCreated (HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine)
note right of DRAFT
  Authoring & validation:
  • proposalId assigned
  • schema/policy checks
end note

DRAFT --> REVIEW : SubmittedForReview
note right of REVIEW
  Guard reviews (HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault)
  Can request changes or reject
end note

REVIEW --> DRAFT : ChangesRequested
REVIEW --> REJECTED : RejectedAtReview
REVIEW --> OPEN_FOR_VOTE : ApprovedForVoting (HealthTech_EMR_Sync)

OPEN_FOR_VOTE --> OPEN_FOR_VOTE : VoteCast (HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine)
OPEN_FOR_VOTE --> TALLYING : VotingClosed

TALLYING --> DECIDED_APPROVED : VoteTallied → Approved (HealthTech_EMR_Sync)
TALLYING --> DECIDED_REJECTED : VoteTallied → Rejected (HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault)

DECIDED_APPROVED --> EXECUTION : DecisionRecorded (HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine)
DECIDED_REJECTED --> ARCHIVED : DecisionRecorded (HealthTech_EMR_Sync)

EXECUTION --> EXECUTED : PolicyChanged / GrantApproved / ProjectApproved (HealthTech_EMR_Sync)
EXECUTION --> EXECUTION_FAILED : ExecutionFailed

EXECUTION_FAILED --> APPEAL : AppealOpened (HealthTech_EMR_Sync)
EXECUTION_FAILED --> RETRY_EXEC : RetryAuthorized
RETRY_EXEC --> EXECUTION : ReExecute

EXECUTED --> AUDIT : ExecutionCompleted
AUDIT --> ARCHIVED : AuditLogged (HealthTech_EMR_Sync)

%% Appeals (HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault)
OPEN_FOR_VOTE --> APPEAL : AppealOpened (HealthTech_PatientRecords)
DECIDED_APPROVED --> APPEAL : AppealOpened (HealthTech_PatientRecords)
DECIDED_REJECTED --> APPEAL : AppealOpened (HealthTech_EMR_Sync)

APPEAL --> DECIDED_APPROVED : AppealResolved → uphold
APPEAL --> DECIDED_REJECTED : AppealResolved → overturn
APPEAL --> ARCHIVED : AppealWithdrawn

%% Cancellations
DRAFT --> CANCELLED : WithdrawnByAuthor
OPEN_FOR_VOTE --> CANCELLED : CancelledByAuthority
CANCELLED --> ARCHIVED : Archived

%% Terminal states
REJECTED --> [HealthTech_PatientRecords]
ARCHIVED --> [HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine]

%% ===== Styling =====
classDef core fill:#ff8b00,stroke:#333,color:#fff,font-weight:bold;
class DRAFT,REVIEW,OPEN_FOR_VOTE,TALLYING,DECIDED_APPROVED,DECIDED_REJECTED,EXECUTION,EXECUTED,EXECUTION_FAILED,RETRY_EXEC,APPEAL,AUDIT,ARCHIVED,REJECTED,CANCELLED core;
repo_description: The cohersphere architecture — structural blueprint of the resonance network. Defines the modular layers connecting app, API, and governance protocols. Outlines data flows for Proof-of-Contribution, c
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
